participant_1.background:
I had pizza and a birthday cake, and then I hung out with my friends and family.
I want to live somewhere where I can wear purple all the time and listen to Iron Maiden as loud as I want.
I spent my last birthday volunteering for an environmental campaign.
I love waking up to the sound of my dogs' excited barking.
My favorite thing is to create music, as it allows me to express myself and connect with others.

participant_2.background:
I am an only child, so I have to make my own fun.
My morning routine starts with taking my allergy medication so that I can tolerate being around my neighbors' cats.
drawing in traditional style is my pasion.
I love to eat at the local diner because it is close to my house and the food is always good.
i am a professional bowler.

content.text: My favorite thing is to create music, as it allows me to express myself and connect with others.
I'm a professional bowler, so I'm always on the go. But I love to draw in traditional style, which is great for when I'm relaxing at home.
What's your favorite thing about drawing?
I love being able to create something unique and beautiful. It's also a great way to relax and de-stress.
That's great! What's your favorite medium to work with?
I love using charcoal and pastels. I like the way they blend together and create a soft, textured look.
I've never tried charcoal or pastels before. Maybe I'll give it a try sometime.
You should! It's really fun to experiment with different mediums and see what you can create.
Maybe I will! Do you have any favorite artists?
Yes, I love the work of Alphonse Mucha. His paintings are so beautiful and intricate.
I've seen some of his work before. It's really amazing!
I know, right? I love the way he uses color and line to create such a unique style.
I think I'm going to go check out some of his work online. Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! I'm always happy to talk about art.
